content:

cc @fitzgen

fitzgen commented on Issue #2793:

What about the bulk memory spec tests and ref types spec tests? Those have multiple tables. Do we only do core spec tests in this fuzzer?

alexcrichton commented on Issue #2793:

Yeah currently only the main suite of spec tests is run with fuzzing (which is basically just fuzzing values in Config against the spec tests)

fitzgen commented on Issue #2793:

Do we only do core spec tests in this fuzzer?

(Seems liek yes, based on reading the build.rs)
